span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified binding, error state, and binding context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `state` 指示绑定过程成功，还是出现了错误或异常。`state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred. `context` 指示当更新在绑定的控件或数据源时是否出现错误。`context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Binding As Binding
public: property System::Windows::Forms::Binding ^ Binding { System::Windows::Forms::Binding ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与此次 事件的发生相关联的绑定。

span.span: Gets the binding associated with this occurrence of a event.
The associated with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还可能与之关联事件或继承自的类。The might also be associated with the event of a or of a class that inherits from . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件并使用以确保控件值之一更改时，绑定到同一数据源的多个控件保持同步。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and use the to ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`InitializeControlsAndData`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/CS/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BindingCompleteState As BindingCompleteState

summary.span: 获取绑定操作的完成状态。

span.span: Gets the completion state of the binding operation.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以确定是否绑定成功，或者出现了错误或异常。Use the to determine if the binding was successful, or an error or exception occurred. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`Binding1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Binding1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#77](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#77)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#77](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#77)]

public: property System::String ^ ErrorText { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取绑定操作过程中发生的错误的文本说明。

span.span: Gets the text description of the error that occurred during the binding operation.

value.span: 绑定操作过程中发生的错误的文本说明。

span.span: The text description of the error that occurred during the binding operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果绑定操作中未发生错误，则此属性返回一个空字符串。This property returns an empty string if no error occurred in the binding operation. 它返回的值属性发生异常时。It returns the value of the property when an exception occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`Binding1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Binding1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回`null`如果绑定操作过程中没有发生异常。This property returns `null` if an exception did not occur during the binding operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件并使用以确保控件值之一更改时，绑定到同一数据源的多个控件保持同步。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event and use the to ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体和调用`InitializeControlsAndData`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method.
